attributes.action: Apologise and resign for lying to the country over british jobs for british workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister in numerous speechs stated British jobs for British workers. 
Now that British workers want British jobs he says he meant "to give the skills required to compete against foreign workers. This amounts to a blatant lie and promise to british workers and he sould apologise and resign.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
